name: v8.1.0
body:
Fixed issue #115, #117.
Addressed issue #110, #116.

name: v7.5.3
body: Fixed #115

name: v8.0.0
body:
Major bump mainly because of [BarFiller](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v8#BarFiller) signature [change](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/commit/83f3fbc52faa7e6775fa12ba4f1b8e80bdc947ff).
Fixed: #105, #107, #109, #111.

name: v7.4.2
body: deps update

name: v7.4.0
body:
Added:

- [func (b *Bar) Aborted() bool](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#Bar.Aborted)
- [func (b *Bar) EnableTriggerComplete()](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#Bar.EnableTriggerComplete)
- [func (b *Bar) Wait()](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#Bar.Wait)

Signature changed:

- [func BarQueueAfter(bar *Bar, sync bool) BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#BarQueueAfter)

name: v7.3.0
body:
Added:

 - [func (p *Progress) New(total int64, builder BarFillerBuilder, options ...BarOption) *Bar](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#Progress.New)
 - [func NopStyle() BarFillerBuilder](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#NopStyle)
 - [func OnCondition(decorator Decorator, cond bool) Decorator](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7@v7.3.0/decor#OnCondition)
 - [func OnPredicate(decorator Decorator, predicate func() bool) Decorator](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7@v7.3.0/decor#OnPredicate)

name: v7.2.0
body:
Added:
 - [func OnAbort(decorator Decorator, message string) Decorator](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7@v7.2.0/decor#OnAbort)

name: v7.1.4
body: Fixes #100.

name: v7.1.3
body: Stable release.

name: v7.1.2
body:
Added:

 - [TipOnComplete(string) BarStyleComposer](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/2202927a29fd99b5752ed4a712398135b837c641/bar_filler_bar.go#L29)

If you prefer bar with inclusive ending tip, like `[=====>] 100%`, then do:
```go
    bar := p.Add(int64(total),
        mpb.NewBarFiller(mpb.BarStyle().TipOnComplete(">")),
        mpb.AppendDecorators(decor.Percentage()),
    )
```

name: v7.0.6
body: Stable release of `v7.0.x`

name: v7.0.5
body:
This release fixes `bar.Abort()` method behavior, see https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/issues/93.
It also contains optimizations which reduce flickering if many bars are used.

name: v7.0.2
body:
v7 released to support complex filler 'runes', see #86.

#### Breaking change:
Signature of [NewBarFiller](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v7#NewBarFiller) function has changed. If you never used that function before, it's safe to migrate to v7.

Related examples that use features of v7:
[mexicanBar](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/master/_examples/mexicanBar/main.go)
[spinTipBar](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/master/_examples/spinTipBar/main.go)
[singleBar](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/master/_examples/singleBar/main.go)

name: v6.0.2
body:
### Removed:
 - [func BarStyle(style string) BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v5#BarStyle)
 - [func BarReverse() BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v5#BarReverse)
 - [func SpinnerStyle(frames []string) BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v5#SpinnerStyle)
 - [func TrimSpace() BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v5#TrimSpace)

To set bar style use [BarFiller](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v6#BarFiller) constructors.

### Added:
 - [func ContainerOptional(option ContainerOption, pick bool) ContainerOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v6#ContainerOptional)
 - [func BarOptional(option BarOption, pick bool) BarOption](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v6#BarOptional)

name: v5.4.0
body:
- Fixed issue #85.
 - BarFillerTrim same as TrimSpace but for better discoverability.
 - One more test `TestMaxWidthDistributor`

name: v5.3.0
body:
Decorators added:

 - [InvertedCurrent…](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#InvertedCurrent)
 - [Current…](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#Current)
 - [Total…](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#Total)

name: mpb v5.2.4
body: Fixed #73

name: mpb v5.2.3
body: Some optimization and minor fixes in cwriter package.

name: mpb v5.2.2
body: Fixed #68 and minor bug fixes.

name: mpb v5.2.1
body:
New dependency on [go-runewidth](https://github.com/mattn/go-runewidth) so decorators can use emoji or any double width runes, refer to [complex](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/v5.2.1/_examples/complex/main.go) example.

Added:
 - [func BarFillerMiddleware(middle func(BarFiller) BarFiller) BarOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarFillerMiddleware)
refer to [suppressBar](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/v5.2.1/_examples/suppressBar/main.go) example.
 - [decor.Statistics](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/v5.2.1/decor/decorator.go#L49) has new fields: `AvailableWidth` and `Refill`.

Minor breaking change:
 - `decor.Statistics` now passed by value in [decor.Decorator](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/v5.2.1/decor/decorator.go#L69) and [mpb.BarFiller](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/blob/v5.2.1/bar_filler.go#L22) interfaces. If you don't use custom decorators, you're not affected.

Fixed #55 #66

name: mpb v5.0.3
body:
v5 introduces braking changes, new API:

 - [func (b *Bar) DecoratorAverageAdjust(start time.Time)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.DecoratorAverageAdjust)
 - [func (b *Bar) DecoratorEwmaUpdate(dur time.Duration)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.DecoratorEwmaUpdate)
 - [func BarQueueAfter(runningBar *Bar) BarOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarQueueAfter)

name: mpb v4.12.1
body:
Added:

 - [func Any(f func(*Statistics) string, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#Any)

Renamed:

 - ContainerOptOnCond to [ContainerOptOn](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#ContainerOptOn)
 - BarOptOnCond to [BarOptOn](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarOptOn)

name: mpb v4.11.0
body:
Added:

 - [func WithRenderDelay(ch <-chan struct{}) ContainerOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#WithRenderDelay)

Method [func (b *Bar) ProxyReader(r io.Reader) io.ReadCloser](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.ProxyReader) now checks if provided reader implements `io.WriterTo` interface. If it is, then underlying proxy reader exposes `WriteTo(io.Writer)` method to improve copy performance. Thanks to @donny-dont for pointing this out in #52.

name: mpb v4.10.0
body:
Added:

 - [func NewBarFiller(style string, reverse bool) Filler](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#NewBarFiller)
 - [func NewSpinnerFiller(style []string, alignment SpinnerAlignment) Filler](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#NewSpinnerFiller)
 - [type BaseFiller](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BaseFiller)
 - [func BarOnComplete(message string) BarOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarOnComplete)

Removed:
 - [func BarNoBrackets() BarOption](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/commit/d3b78c93a62fb77196e12fde5a0f0685de2f51f0#diff-9edadeeb048bc0aa2f297e178e0c8705L168https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/commit/d3b78c93a62fb77196e12fde5a0f0685de2f51f0#diff-9edadeeb048bc0aa2f297e178e0c8705L168)
to achieve the same use:
```go
mpb.TrimSpace(),
mpb.BarStyle(" =>- "),
```

name: mpb v4.9.0
body:
Fixed #47 by adding following methods, thanks to @Liupold for pointing this out.

 - [NewAverageETA](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#NewAverageETA)
 - [NewAverageSpeed](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#NewAverageSpeed)
 - [AdjustAverageDecorators](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.AdjustAverageDecorators)

Refactored `decor` package.
Improved some doc comments.

name: mpb v4.8.0
body:
Added:
 - [PopCompletedMode](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#PopCompletedMode)
 - [BarNoPop](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarNoPop)

name: mpb v4.7.0
body:
License change to Unlicense.

Added:
 - [Bar.IncrInt64](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.IncrInt64)
 - [mpb.BarNoBrackets](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarNoBrackets)
 - [decor.Merge](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#Merge)

name: mpb v4.6.0
body:
Added:
 - [func (b *Bar) Abort(drop bool)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.Abort)
 - [func (b *Bar) SetPriority(priority int)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.SetPriority)

Deprecated:
 - [func (p *Progress) UpdateBarPriority(b *Bar, priority int)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.UpdateBarPriority)

Removed:
 - `func (p *Progress) Abort(b *Bar, remove bool)`
 - `func WithContext(context.Context) ContainerOption`

name: mpb v4.5.0
body:
Added:
 - [func NewWithContext(ctx context.Context, options ...ContainerOption) *Progress](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#NewWithContext)
 - [func BarParkTo(runningBar *Bar) BarOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarParkTo)

Deprecated:
 - [func WithContext(ctx context.Context) ContainerOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#WithContext)
 - [func BarReplaceOnComplete(runningBar *Bar) BarOption](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarReplaceOnComplete)

Fixed bug in [func (b *Bar) SetRefill(amount int64)](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.SetRefill) and changed its signature from `int` to `int64`.

name: mpb v4.4.0
body: [SetCurrent](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.SetCurrent), colses #33

name: mpb v4.3.0
body: [BarReverse](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarReverse) option

name: mpb v4.2.0
body:
- better windows support
- for posix terminals, ANSI sequence change from `CUU1,EL\r` for each line to single `CUUn,ED`  where n is line count. Hopefully should fix blinking effect.
- for infrequent (long) refresh rates, there is no latency on bar complete event, i.e. bar quits as soon as it has been completed.
- added spinner decorator
- as usual it is go module

name: mpb v4.0.0
body:
mpb v4 requires Go 1.10.3+ (or Go 1.9.7+)
mpb v4 is a Go module and thus breaks the import path; use `"github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v4"` and `"github.com/vbauerster/mpb/v4/decor"`

name: mpb 3.3.4
body:
Make SetTotal non-blocking, to prevent misuse, such in https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/issues/34
Some performance optimisations

name: mpb 3.3.3
body:
Fixes:
 - #30 

New features:
 - [WithManualRefresh](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#WithManualRefresh), #27 #28

name: mpb 3.3.2
body:
New Bar option [BarNewLineExtend](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BarNewLineExtend).
[TimeNormalizer](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#TimeNormalizer), to be used directly with [MovingAverageETA](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#MovingAverageETA).
Signature of [Abort](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.Abort) method has been changed a bit.
[RefillBy](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.RefillBy) deprecated, use [SetRefill](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.SetRefill) instead.

name: mpb 3.3.1
body:
Added:

 - [func AverageETA(style int, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#AverageETA)
- [func AverageSpeed(unit int, unitFormat string, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#AverageSpeed)

Removed start block channel parameter, in all ewma based decorators:

 - [func EwmaETA(style int, age float64, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#EwmaETA)
 - [func EwmaSpeed(unit int, unitFormat string, age float64, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#EwmaSpeed)

name: mpb 3.3.0
body:
This release breaks some decorator function signature, but makes width related parameters optional.
For example before user had to specify width related params, even default ones:
```go
mpb.PrependDecorators(decor.Name("name", 0, 0))
```
Now if you're ok with defaults, just do:
```go
mpb.PrependDecorators(decor.Name("name"))
```
Decorator implementation completely decoupled from the core. For example in previous releases if user didn't use ETA decorator, it was calculated by core anyway. Now if you don't use ETA, it is not calculated at all, same applies to all decorators which need calculation.

There was issue #20 reported, which helped me to realize, that ETA decorator was tightly coupled to the core and it is not easy to re-implement it by the user. So now to re-implement ETA all you need is just to provide your own implementation of [MovingAverage](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#MovingAverage) interface, if you don't like default [ewma](https://github.com/VividCortex/ewma) based implementation.

[func MovingAverageETA(style int, average MovingAverage, sb chan time.Time, wcc ...WC) Decorator](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#MovingAverageETA)

Alternative implementation of [MovingAverage](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#MovingAverage) interface, also provided:
 - [Median](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#NewMedian)
 - [MedianEwma](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#NewMedianEwma)

Also I'd like to thank @xakep666, for his human friendly speed decorator pull request.

name: mpb 3.2.0
body:
Breaking api change:

- removed [func (p *Progress) Stop()](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.Stop)
- added [func (p *Progress) Wait()](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.Wait)

All deprecated methods have been removed.

name: mpb 3.1.1
body:
Minor bug, where simultaneous cancellation and [RemoveBar](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.RemoveBar) would cause hang, has been fixed. 
Some godoc refactored to reflect relevant information.

name: mpb 3.1.0
body:
Api changes:
Added:
[Progress.UpdateBarPriority](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Progress.UpdateBarPriority)
[Bar.IncrBy](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.IncrBy)
[decor.StaticName](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#StaticName)
[decor.CountersKibiByte](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#CountersKibiByte)
[decor.CountersKiloByte](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#CountersKiloByte)
[decor.CountersNoUnit](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#CountersNoUnit)
Removed:
[mpb.WithBeforeRenderFunc](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#WithBeforeRenderFunc)
[mpb.BeforeRender](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#BeforeRender)
Deprecated:
[Bar.Incr](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.Incr), use [Bar.IncrBy](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#Bar.IncrBy) instead.

Issue [#14](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/issues/14) has been fixed. Thanks to @elbaro for reporting.
Default RefreshRate changed form 100ms to 120ms.

name: mpb 3.0.4
body:
Some new features:
- **Dynamic total**, thanks to @mozillazg and @cognusion for the idea.
- **Adaptive bar resize** (not supported in windows)

Improvements:
- Reduced screen blinking, thanks to @lanwen for his [pr](https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/pull/12).
- Other minor improvements.

name: mpb 3.0.2
body:
Deprecated:

 * [func Name(name string, minWidth int, conf byte) DecoratorFunc](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#Name)

New:

 * [func StaticName(name string, minWidth int, conf byte) DecoratorFunc](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#StaticName)
 * [func DynamicName(nameFn func(*Statistics) string, minWidth int, conf byte) DecoratorFunc](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb/decor#DynamicName)

name: mpb 3.0.1
body: New ProgressOption: [OutputInterceptors](https://godoc.org/github.com/vbauerster/mpb#OutputInterceptors). See issue #8.

name: mpb 3.0.0
body:
mpb v3 release is incompatible with mpb v2!!!

Api changed to favour functional options pattern.

name: mpb 2.1.1
body: Last release of v2

name: mpb 2.1.0
body:
Huge update. Many bugs related to cancelation have been fixed.

Public API change:

removed:

  - b.GetAppenders
  - b.GetPrependers

modified signature:

 - b.IncrWithReFill(n int, r *Refill)

deprecated method, use b.Complete():

  - b.Completed()

name: mpb 2.0.7
body:
Minor refactoring, which doesn't affect any API.
Add goreportcard to README

name: mpb 2.0.6
body:
More Statistics fields:
```go
type Statistics struct {
	Completed           bool
	Total               int64
	Current             int64
	IncrAmount          int64
	StartTime           time.Time
	TimeElapsed         time.Duration
	TimePerItemEstimate time.Duration
}
```

name: mpb 2.0.5
body: License update to BSD 3-Clause

name: mpb 2.0.4
body:
Fix issue https://github.com/vbauerster/mpb/issues/7

Bug fixed:
 - Negative percentage display when `total <= 0`

name: mpb 2.0.3
body:
remove "log" dependency
minor performance improvement (not allocating new map, to maintain sequencing)
some refactoring

name: mpb 2.0.2
body:
better ETA computation
minor fixes inside newWidthSync

name: mpb 2.0.1
body:
Fixed bug, when bar size gets > than provided width.
Show Width Sync usage in Readme.

name: mpb 2.0.0
body:
Incompatible API comparing to v1:

- parameterless constructor: p.New()
- new methods: p.WithCancel(); p.WithContext() both used for cancelation puproses.
- DecoratorFunc type signature changed to: func(*Statistics, chan<- int, <-chan int) string
- Signatures of all predefined decorators changed.

New Feature:
Dynamic Decorator's Width Sync: Sync width among decorator group (column)

name: mpb 1.1.3
body:
(formatter) cleanup with greater test coverage. Thanks to @alevinval 
(posix-writer) test coverage, simplify logic and faster clearLines(). Thanks to @alevinval

name: mpb 1.1.2
body: Minor bug fixes.

name: mpb 1.1.1
body:
Introduce new method: 
(*mpb.Progress).Format(format string)
for customising bar format

name: mpb 1.1.0
body:
Introduce
(*mpb.Progress).BeforeRenderFunc(f mpb.BeforeRender)
method, which accepts a func, which gets called before render process. Ideal place to sort bars, see sort example.
Removed (*mpb.Progress).WithSort method
Removed (*mpb.Bar).Current method, use (*mpb.Bar).GetStatistics instead

name: mpb 1.0.1
body:
Fix update for urxvt, thanks to @fd0 
Display simple spinner if total is unknown

name: mpb 1.0.0
body: Stable release of mpb
